sentence.Network_en: The Lurker focuses on spies, cloaks and subterfuge to devastate opponents.
sentence.Network_cn: 潜行者专注于使用间谍, 掩饰,和诡计去摧毁敌人.

sentence.Network_en: The lurker begins as a trader, building his ship up quickly.
sentence.Network_cn: 潜行者开始会是一个商人, 快速建造起他自己的船.

sentence.Network_en: The lurker is good for players with patience.
sentence.Network_cn: 潜行者很适用于有耐性的玩家.
